DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct Japan . The aim trial investigate efficacy insulin detemir blood glucose control subject insulin require diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Insulin Detemir Subjects With Insulin Requiring Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Duration diabetes mellitus least 2 year Current treatment basalbolus regimen least 12 week use intermediate/longacting human insulin insulin aspart HbA1C 11.0 % Impaired renal function Impaired hepatic function Serious heart diseases Known hypoglycaemia unawareness recurrent major hypoglycaemia Proliferative retinopathy maculopathy require acute treatment Uncontrolled treated/untreated hypertension Current treatment total insulin dose 100 IU/day Current treatment expect screening start treatment systemic corticosteroid
